pages.text: At night in the $(thing)Misty World$() and rarely in the $(thing)Nether$(), you'll encounter these tall, dark, menacing figures known simply as $(thing)Endermen$(). These creatures come straight from the nightmares of children, yet fortunately are mostly passive unless provoked. Unfortunately, merely looking at them directly is enough of a slight to attract their ire.
